td.span: Weight of empty Pycnometer in gms : W1
Weight of Pycnometer with full of water in gms : W2
[Weight of Pycnometer + Saturated surface dry Aggregate] in gms : W3
[Weight of Pycnometer + Saturated surface dry Aggregate + Water] in gms : W4
Weight of Saturated surface dry Aggregate in gms : A=W3-W1
Weight of Oven dried Aggregate in gms : (B)
Volume of water displaced by saturated surface dry aggregate : C=(W2-W1)-(W4-W3)
SPECIFIC GRAVITY : (B/C)
Water absorption % : (A-B)/B
Weight of Empty Bucket in kg : (A)
Volume of Bucket in litre : (B)
[Sample Weight + Bucket Empty Weight] in kg : (C)
Sample Weight in kg : (D=C-A)
Loose Bulk Density in kg per litre : (D/B)
Weight of Empty Bucket in kg : (A)
Volume of Bucket in litre : (B)
[S[Sample Weight + Bucket Empty Weight] in kg : (C)
Sample Weight in kg : (D=C-A)
Rodded Bulk Density in kg per litre: (D/B)
Me = weight in g of container filled up to the mark with water
Ms = weight in g of the sample
M = weight in g of the sample and container filled to the mark with water
Vs = (Me + Ms) - M
Md = Specific Gravity
Vd = Ms / Md
Vd = (Vs-Vd) / (Ms-Vd)*100
weight of sample in gms : (A)
Weight of dry sample after retained in 75 microns : (B)
Material finer than 75 micron (%) : [(A-B)/A]*100
weight of sample in gms : (W)
Weight of sample after Removal of Clay Lumps : (R)
Clay Lumps in % : L=[(W-R)/W]*100
weight of sample in gms : (W)
Weight of Decanted sample (Light weight particle) : (W1)
Light Weight Particle in % : L=(W1/W)*100

tr.t-if: data.specific_gravity_visible or data.loose_bulk_visible or data.rodded_bulk_visible or data.moisture_content_visible
data.specific_gravity_visible and (data.specific_gravity_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.specific_gravity_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl)
data.specific_gravity_visible and (data.specific_gravity_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.specific_gravity_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl)
data.loose_bulk_visible and (data.loose_bulk_density_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.loose_bulk_density_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl)
data.rodded_bulk_visible and (data.rodded_bulk_density_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.rodded_bulk_density_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl)
data.moisture_content_visible and (data.moisture_content_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.moisture_content_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl)
data.soundness_mgso4_visible and (data.soundness_mgso4_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.soundness_mgso4_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl)
data.soundness_na2so4_visible and (data.soundness_na2so4_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.soundness_na2so4_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl)
data.clay_lump_visible and (data.clay_lumps_percent_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.clay_lumps_percent_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl)
data.light_weight_visible and (data.light_weight_percent_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.light_weight_percent_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl)
data.finer75_visible and (data.material_finer75_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or (data.material_finer75_nabl == 'fail' or eln.sample_id.scope != 'nabl') and not nabl)

ul.li: The Test Report(s) is/are valid only to the sample submitted to the laboratory.
Sample(s) was/were not drawn by laboratory.
